item.title: Looking to hire a motion graphics - Upwork
item.description:
Hello everyone,

Looking for a motion graphics artist to create great typography teaser video for a product launch. It is a short script, less than 15 seconds only.

Have the script ready and need someone to edit it and have it ready for me by morning today. If you are the one I am looking for, please send me samples of your work. Thanks

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 29, 2024 06:14 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Animation
Skills: Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Animation

item.title: Freelance Videographer - Madrid - Upwork
item.description:
Location: New York, US

Description:
Seeking a skilled freelance videographer in Madrid to create captivating video content for our clients. Responsibilities include filming on location, editing footage, and ensuring timely delivery. Must have own transportation.

Requirements:

Proven videography experience
Proficient in filming and editing
Own transportation (preferably van)
Flexible schedule

Category: Video Production

item.title: Video Editor for Kids YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to help create engaging content for our kids YouTube channel. As the video editor, you will be responsible for editing, adding sound effects, simple animations, green screen edits.  
Ensure the content is constantly moving and captures attention for kids.
The themes are like vlad and niki channel.
The ideal candidate should have experience in editing videos specifically for children, with a good understanding of their interests and preferences. You should also be familiar with popular editing software and have a creative mindset to add fun and captivating elements to the videos. Attention to detail and the ability to meet deadlines are essential. If you have a passion for creating entertaining content for kids, we would love to hear from you!

Please share you editing examples and green screen edits.

Skills needed:
- Green screen Video editing
- Creativity
- ASOund effects and animation
- Meeting deadlines

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 05:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: Singapore
click to apply
